queries:
CREATE TABLE "out_review"
AS
    SELECT
        "d"."review_id"             AS "review_id",
        "r"."location_id"           AS "location_id",
        "r"."review_published_at"   AS "review_published_at",
        "r"."review_title"          AS "review_title",
        IFF(LENGTH("r"."review_text") > 1024, LEFT("r"."review_text", 1021) || '...',
            "r"."review_text")      AS "review_text",
        "r"."rating"                AS "rating",
        "r"."source"                AS "source",
        "r"."review_url"            AS "source_url",
        "d"."sentimentLabel"        AS "sentiment_label",
        "d"."sentimentValue"        AS "sentiment_value",
        "d"."usedChars"             AS "review_text_length",
        "r"."response_published_at" AS "response_published_at",
        IFF(LENGTH("r"."response_text") > 1024, LEFT("r"."response_text", 1021) || '...',
            "r"."response_text")    AS "response_text",
        "r"."has_response"          AS "has_response",
        "r"."days_to_response"      AS "days_to_response"
    FROM "nlp_documents" "d"
             LEFT JOIN "pre_nlp_review" "r"
                       ON "d"."review_id" = "r"."review_id";

--list of entities
--entities have more records that relations, because they contain keywords without relation as well
--keeping only the main types in the output table
CREATE TABLE "out_entity"
AS
    SELECT
        "review_id" || '-' || "type" || '-' || "text" AS "entity_id",
        "review_id"                                   AS "review_id",
        "type"                                        AS "entity_type",
        "text"                                        AS "entity",
        "sentimentValue"                              AS "sentiment_value",
        "sentimentLabel"                              AS "sentiment_label"
    FROM "nlp_entities"
    WHERE "type" IN ('food', 'general');

--list of tags for the review
CREATE TABLE "out_tag"
AS
    SELECT
        "review_id" || '-' || "text" AS "tag_id",
        "review_id"                  AS "review_id",
        "text"                       AS "tag"
    FROM "nlp_entities"
    WHERE "type" = 'tag';

-- list of attributes related to subjects (like "cozy" "place")
CREATE TABLE "out_attribute_relation"
AS
    SELECT
        "review_id" || '-' || "subject" || '-' || "name" AS "attribute_relation_id",
        "review_id"                                      AS "review_id",
        "subject"                                        AS "subject",
        "name"                                           AS "attribute",
        "sentimentLabel"                                 AS "sentiment_label",
        "sentimentValue"                                 AS "sentiment_value"
    FROM "nlp_relations"
    WHERE "type" = 'ATTR';

-- list of external relations which describe hierarchy
CREATE TABLE "out_hierarchy_relation"
AS
    SELECT
        "review_id" || '-' || "object" || '-' || "subject" AS "hierarchy_relation_id",
        "review_id"                                        AS "review_id",
        "object"                                           AS "object",
        "subject"                                          AS "entity",
        "sentimentLabel"                                   AS "sentiment_label",
        "sentimentValue"                                   AS "sentiment_value"
    FROM "nlp_relations"
    WHERE "type" = 'EXTERNAL';

--sentences of the review
CREATE TABLE "out_sentence"
AS
    SELECT
        "review_id" || '-' || "index"                                   AS "sentence_id",
        "review_id"                                                     AS "review_id",
        IFF(LENGTH("text") > 1024, LEFT("text", 1021) || '...', "text") AS "sentence",
        "index"                                                         AS "order",
        "segment"                                                       AS "segment",
        "sentimentValue"                                                AS "sentiment_value",
        "sentimentLabel"                                                AS "sentiment_label"
    FROM "nlp_sentences";
configuration.name: Reviews Enhancement

description: Combining processed data with Geneea app output.
